gameBGM - Static variable in class main.Main
 
GameLoop - Class in main
Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
Date: Wednesday, April 21, 2016
Class Description:

GameLoop is a base class that plays the motion and dynamics of every object in game.
Also responsible for deciding active elements in game.
Loop runs at 60FPS (under ideal resource allocation).
GameLoop(Main) - Constructor for class main.GameLoop
Constructs a new Loop to run the game.
genBrick(float[], int) - Method in class main.Main
To generate new Brick element in stage.
genFireball(float, float, int) - Method in class main.Main
To generate new fireball power from player when requested by user.
genFireballBig(float, float) - Method in class main.Main
To generate new bigger fireball power from player when requested by user.
genGoomba(float[], int, boolean) - Method in class main.Main
To generate new Goomba enemy in stage.
genPowerTile(float[], int) - Method in class main.Main
To generate new Power Tile element in stage.
genSecretBlock(float[], int) - Method in class main.Main
To generate new Secret Block (which generates yolo image by default) element in stage.
genStarBrick(float[], int) - Method in class main.Main
To generate new Star Brick (which generates invincibility star) element in stage.
genTile(float[], int) - Method in class main.Main
To generate new Coin Tile element in stage.

getCurrentCast() - Static method in class main.SpriteHandler
To get the main Sprites: The Player (Mario), Stage Floor, Flag Pole.
Only Mario is dynamic Sprite, rest are static.
Sprites that do not belong to any of the Interfaces must be accessed from here.
